The droppers all have one stackable item and one non-stackable item. The numbered hoppers have {{frac|2|1|2}} stacks for power level 8, {{frac|1|1|4}} stacks for power level 4, {{frac|1|2}} stack for power level 2, and 1 64-stackable item for power level 1.
